name: To Walk Alone
description:
"To Walk Alone" was created for the Wits and Vega Inter-campus Game Jam 2021, and was inspired by the "don't look" theme. 

With the creation of this game, we aimed to replicate the anxiety and fears many women experience when walking alone, with a particular focus on the feeling of not wanting to be looked at or noticed. In this regard, the events which take place are an over-exaggerated  version of reality in order to recreate a heightened level of anxiety.

Team: Four Old Men

Art and Animation: Michaela Bussey

Level design: Diyanka Govender

Programming: Jodi Chapson

Sound and music: Juliette Love

Members:  Michaela Bussey (https://mickybussey.itch.io/ ), Diyanka Govender (https://diyanka-govender.itch.io/), Juliette Love (https://juliette-love.itch.io/ ) and Jodi Chapson (https://dominaiscna.itch.io/ )

Clara has had a long day at university. It's time to walk home.
